about_the_game:
WELCOME TO THE LAND OF THE ANCIENT KING!

Saddle up your Caravan Demon, lace up your coin purse and get ready to venture out into the world in Mini Merchant, the first release from Astrarium Games!

Travel across the snowy peaks of Oareg Mountain, the Great Desert, the King’s Meadows and untold more places as you fight monsters, explore dungeons, solve puzzles and most importantly, gather loot to sell to the highest bidder!

Buy, sell, loot, uncover and unlock weapons, armor, items and cargo to become the richest and most powerful merchant in the land!

A CLASSIC ADVENTURE

With artwork and gameplay inspired by the retro titles of the 1980s and 1990s, explore the world in any direction and with no constraints - it’s up to you to figure out how you’ll get rich.

Explore in any direction, discover the many secrets hidden in the world at your own pace.

DEEP POCKETS

There are over 175 different items to find in the game, each with their own prices, weights and lore behind them. Can you find them all?

Each market has its own preferred items, prices and quests to complete. Learn the secret routes between the markets to buy the cheapest and the rarest items, which items to sell in which locations and which to hold onto!

THE CARAVAN CHAMPION

The best items are guarded by the most powerful enemies. Equip your character with the most powerful equipment, fight to defeat monsters and level up your character, so that you’re strong enough to brave even the toughest dungeons!

Different equipment boosts and lowers different stats, so the best loadout is in the eye of the beholder… choose equipment that works for you best!

INTO THE DARKNESS

With 30 different puzzle-filled dungeons to discover, 250 quests to complete, collectables to find, challenges to discover and monsters to slay, there’s always something new to do!

Each dungeon is procedurally generated, so the challenge is different every time!

CAN YOU GET TO 100%?

There are 160 total achievements to unlock - can you get them all?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-1005G1 or AMD Ryzen 3 3250U (or equivalent dual-core processor)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics such as Intel UHD Graphics 620/630 or AMD Radeon Vega 3
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card compatible with DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Saddle up your Caravan Demon and journey out to explore the Land Of The Ancient King! Explore beaches, meadows, tundra and desert to buy, sell, uncover and unlock items, and become the richest merchant in the land! A classic collect-a-thon adventure RPG, from Astrarium Games.
